original: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattīti?
Sāvako jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
Sāvako anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
tena hi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṁ atthīti …pe….
Vimuttiñāṇaṁ vimuttaṁ, sekhassa asekhaṁ ñāṇaṁ, viparīte ñāṇaṁ, aniyatassa niyāmagamanāya
atthi ñāṇaṁ, sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭisambhidāti, sammutiñāṇaṁ, cetopariyāye ñāṇaṁ, anāgate
ñāṇaṁ, paṭuppanne ñāṇaṁ, sāvakassa phale ñāṇanti.
Sattupaladdhiṁ, upaharato, balaṁ, gihi’ssa arahā ca, vimuttipañcamanti.
